article_text: Taking a company public can provide great benefits but the decision to do so should not be made lightly, writes Norman Smagley, EVP and CFO for Gogo. There are many hidden costs and managing in the public domain can be challenging. But if you have made up your mind to do so, there are some practical considerations to factor into your thinking.

article_summary:
Taking a company public can provide great benefits but the decision to do so should not be made lightly, writes Norman Smagley, EVP and CFO for Gogo.
There are many hidden costs and managing in the public domain can be challenging.
But if you have made up your mind to do so, there are some practical considerations to factor into your thinking.
